Protocols.html#/s:8Overlays11OverlayView.name: OverlayView
Protocols.html#/s:8Overlays11OverlayView.abstract: The marker protocol. You should implement it in your custom overlay views.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: showOverlay(_:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Displays the overlay inside the view controller.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: updateOverlayFrame()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Call this method to update the frame of the overlay after layout changes..

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: hideOverlay()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Hides all overlays displayed inside the view controller.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC8Ove.name: showOverlay(_:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC8Ove.abstract: Disables user interactions and displays the overlay atop of the current view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC8Ove.name: hideOverlay()
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC8Ove.abstract: Enables user interactions and hides all overlays displayed for the current view.

Enums/OverlayTemplateAlignment.html#/s:8.name: center
Enums/OverlayTemplateAlignment.html#/s:8.abstract: Items will be in the center of the overlay.

Enums/OverlayTemplateAlignment.html#/s:8.name: top
Enums/OverlayTemplateAlignment.html#/s:8.abstract: Items will be in the top of the overlay.

Enums/OverlayTemplateAlignment.html#/s:8.name: bottom
Enums/OverlayTemplateAlignment.html#/s:8.abstract: Items will be in the bottom of the overlay.

Enums/OverlayTemplateAlignment.html.name: OverlayTemplateAlignment
Enums/OverlayTemplateAlignment.html.abstract: It defines items alignment for the overlay.

Classes/OverlayTemplate.html#/s:8Overlay.name: stackView
Classes/OverlayTemplate.html#/s:8Overlay.abstract: An UIStackView instance using to store the overlay subviews. You can use it to adjust alignment or spacing. Also, you can use it to create border constraints for UIView instances used for addView() method.

Classes/OverlayTemplate.html#/s:8Overlay.name: init(alignment:margins:)
Classes/OverlayTemplate.html#/s:8Overlay.abstract: Creates an instance of the overlay template that is ready for use with Overlays library.

Classes/OverlayTemplate.html#/s:8Overlay.name: addHeadline(_:)
Classes/OverlayTemplate.html#/s:8Overlay.abstract: Adds an UILabel instance with the specified text, .headline text style, and black color.

Classes/OverlayTemplate.html#/s:8Overlay.name: addSubhead(_:)
Classes/OverlayTemplate.html#/s:8Overlay.abstract: Adds an UILabel instance with the specified text, .subheadline text style, and black color.

Classes/OverlayTemplate.html#/s:8Overlay.name: addText(_:font:color:)
Classes/OverlayTemplate.html#/s:8Overlay.abstract: Adds an UILabel instance with the specified text, font, and color.

Classes/OverlayTemplate.html#/s:8Overlay.name: addImage(named:)
Classes/OverlayTemplate.html#/s:8Overlay.abstract: Adds an UIImageView instance displayed an UIImage with the specified name.

Classes/OverlayTemplate.html#/s:8Overlay.name: addImage(_:)
Classes/OverlayTemplate.html#/s:8Overlay.abstract: Adds an UIImageView instance displayed the specified image.

Classes/OverlayTemplate.html#/s:8Overlay.name: addView(_:)
Classes/OverlayTemplate.html#/s:8Overlay.abstract: Adds the specified view. Please note that the view must have forced height or the intrinsic content size.

Classes/KeyboardAwareOverlays.html#/s:8O.name: startListeningKeyboardEvents()
Classes/KeyboardAwareOverlays.html#/s:8O.abstract: Starts listening for the keyboard events. You should call this method in viewWillAppear() of the view controller.

Classes/KeyboardAwareOverlays.html#/s:8O.name: stopListeningKeyboardEvents()
Classes/KeyboardAwareOverlays.html#/s:8O.abstract: Stops listen for the keyboard events. You should call this method in viewWillDisappear() of the view controller.

Classes/KeyboardAwareOverlays.html#/s:8O.name: show(_:)
Classes/KeyboardAwareOverlays.html#/s:8O.abstract: Displays the overlay inside the view controller.

Classes/KeyboardAwareOverlays.html#/s:8O.name: updateOverlayFrame()
Classes/KeyboardAwareOverlays.html#/s:8O.abstract: Updates the frame of the overlay after layout changes.

Classes/KeyboardAwareOverlays.html#/s:8O.name: hide()
Classes/KeyboardAwareOverlays.html#/s:8O.abstract: Hides all overlays displayed inside the view controller.

Classes/KeyboardAwareOverlays.html.name: KeyboardAwareOverlays
Classes/KeyboardAwareOverlays.html.abstract: This class is to display overlays above the keyboard.
